name: Escape The Stasi (Historically Accurate Game Jam 3)
name_original: Escape The Stasi (Historically Accurate Game Jam 3)
description:
Escape The Stasi was made for the Historically Accurate Game Jam 3. 

Hover Over Objects In Each Scene To See Your Choices. Left-Click On The Choice To Proceed. Choose Wisely To Escape.

Art/Coding/Sound Editing/Theme Music:  coreylr197

Story/Play Testing/Editing: Matthew Miles

Sounds Provided By: InspectorJ Sound Effects, Shapeforms, Olivier Girardot, freesounds.org
